summary: Am I the only one who still isn't even over the trailer yet? Like PUTAIN! I will never get over it. I will never get over the...
body:
Am I the only one who still isn’t even over the trailer yet? Like PUTAIN! I will never get over it. I will never get over the piano scene. I will never get over Polaris. I will never get over raccoons and hedgehogs. I will never get over not necessarily a girl. I will never get over samedi9h17. I will never get over the love. The pain. The happiness. I will never get over Skam France.

Putain my life is ruined again

tags: it's very freeing to think of them seperately
i love how each creative team has taken the same premise and breathed a different life into the story
idk i just saw a post about them potentially not reuniting on friday
and i realised that while i rly want them both to be happy
i'm super intrigued to see all the other ways this could play out
because ultimately yes they are going to have that happy ending
this is not a 'skam france is superior' post because that's not what i believe
it's just an appreciation of their differences
summary: every day i care less and less about how skam france compares to the og. i’ve stopped thinking about how the clips/timeline...
body: every day i care less and less about how skam france compares to the og. i’ve stopped thinking about how the clips/timeline corresponds and what we’re waiting for next. i’m enjoying watching it for what it has to offer and the surprises/shocks/horrors that await us around the bend.

summary: wait what’s the pic of the computer screen with vendredi on it mean ???
question: wait what’s the pic of the computer screen with vendredi on it mean ???
answer:
(about this post)

the first picture is the thumbnail from le premier (the first kiss scene from ep4)

the second is a behind the scenes photo (i believe from maxence’s insta??) and if you look closely, the background is of a church. going off of og’s plot, this will be the o helga natt scene as it’s the only one where isak/lucas is in or around a church.

the thing that we’re all freaking out about is the time stamp. le premier was released on vendredi, 20h27, and the thumbnail of the supposed o helga natt scene is also marked vendredi 20h27; meaning the o helga natt scene will happen at the same time as their first kiss. poetic cinema.

summary: Can you stop tagging your asks about the actors personal lives in the skam france tag? Idc if they date or not, it's their...
question: Can you stop tagging your asks about the actors personal lives in the skam france tag? Idc if they date or not, it's their personal lives and I don't wanna know shit about it in the tag that is about the show. Tag their names so it can appear there.
answer:
blockity block me

The reason I tag is so I can keep my blog organized. skam italia posts go under skam italia tags, Skam France posts go under Skam France tags, and so on, Susan.

I don’t tag things because I have an evil plan and I want you, specifically, to see my posts. Block me if it ruins your day. No hard feelings boo
